cfg_EnableNibbleTimeMultiplier.name: Enable nibble time multiplier
cfg_EnableNibbleTimeMultiplier.desc: Enable multiplier for nibble time, which is how long it takes for a fish to bite.
cfg_EnableSpeedMultiplier.name: Enable bar speed multiplier
cfg_EnableSpeedMultiplier.desc: Enable speed multiplier for the green bar when fishing. Affects rise and fall speed equally.
cfg_EnableDistanceGainMultiplier.name: Enable catch speed multiplier
cfg_EnableDistanceGainMultiplier.desc: Enable speed multiplier for catching fish, when the green bar is on top of the fish.
cfg_EnableDistanceLossMultiplier.name: Enable loss speed multiplier
cfg_EnableDistanceLossMultiplier.desc: Enable speed multiplier for losing fish, when the green bar is not on top of the fish.
Cfg_NibbleTimeMultiplier.name: Nibble time multiplier
Cfg_NibbleTimeMultiplier.desc: Multiplier for nibble time. A Value below 1 means fish bite faster, above 1 means fish bite slower.
cfg_SpeedMultiplier.name: Bar speed multiplier
cfg_SpeedMultiplier.desc: Speed multiplier for green bar you control while fishing. A value below 1 means the bar is slower, a value above 1 mean it's faster.
cfg_DistanceGainMultiplier.name: Catch speed multiplier
cfg_DistanceGainMultiplier.desc: Speed multiplier for catching a fish in the minigame, when the green bar is on the fish. A value below 1 means you catch fish slower, a value above 1 means you catch fish faster.
cfg_DistanceLossMultiplier.name: Loss speed multiplier
cfg_DistanceLossMultiplier.desc: Speed multiplier for losing a fish in the minigame, when the green bar is not on the fish. A value below 1 means you lose fish slower (fishing becomes easier), a value above 1 means you lose fish faster (fishing is harder).
